short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collection of small & convenient JSON tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you need to finish some simple tasks on JSON processing like JSON to CSV/XML/YAML, or you need to manipulate JSON data like prettifying, minifying or parsing them. This extension can help you get them done easily. 

Just paste what you want to process, and click on start button, then wait for the result to come out. It is fast and effective! 

18 functions are available for now and more will be added to the extension in a regular basis. 

- Prettify JSON: formats JSON data to easy-to-read form
- Minify JSON: minifies and compresses JSON data
- Stringify JSON: converts JSON object or value to JSON string
- Parse JSON: converts JSON string to JSON object or value
- Escape JSON: transforms special characters to escape sequences
- Unescape JSON: transforms escape sequences to original characters
- JSON to XML: converts JSON data to XML format
- XML to JSON: converts XML data to JSON format
- JSON to CSV: converts JSON data to CSV format
- CSV to JSON: converts CSV data to JSON format
- JSON to YAML: converts JSON data to YAML format
- YAML to JSON: converts YAML data to JSON format
- JSON to TSV: converts JSON data to TSV format
- TSV to JSON: converts TSV data to JSON format
- Base64 Encode: converts JSON data to Base64-encode format
- Base64 Decode: converts Base64-encoded data to original JSON
- URL Encode: converts JSON data to URL-encode format
- URL Decode: converts URL-encoded data to original JSON

Enjoy the ease of use offered by our JSON tools! Additionally, we've provided links to other tool extensions we've developed, including XML, CSV, and ChatGPT, for your convenience.
